displayName.french: Tout va bien, tout va bien.

description.english: See the fire at Gobbler's knob.
description.german: Seht das Feuer in Gogglers Knob.
description.french: Regardez le feu à Goggler's Knob.
description.italian: Ammira il fuoco al Goggler's Knob.
description.spanish: Contempla el incendio en Goggler's Knob.
description.japanese: Goggler's Knobの火を見てください。

description.english: Prevent Sophie from crashing the minivan.
description.german: Halte Sophie davon ab, den Minivan zum Absturz zu bringen.
description.french: Empêche Sophie de s'écraser sur le minivan.
description.italian: Impedire a Sophie di mandare all'aria il minivan.
description.koreana: 소피가 미니 밴을 부수 지 않도록하십시오.
description.spanish: Evita que Sophie estrelle el monovolumen.
description.japanese: ソフィーがミニバンをクラッシュさせないようにしてください。

description.english: Convice Ned to help Sarah.
description.german: Überzeuge Ned, Sarah zu helfen.
description.french: Convainquez Ned d'aider Sarah.
description.italian: Convincere Ned ad aiutare Sarah.
description.spanish: Convence a Ned de ayudar a Sarah.
description.japanese: サラを助けてネッドを説得してください。

description.english: Impress John with your graffiti.
description.german: Beeindrucke John mit deinem Graffiti.
description.french: Impressionnez John avec vos graffitis.
description.italian: Impressiona John con i tuoi graffiti.
description.koreana: 그래피티로 존에게 깊은 인상을 심어 라.
description.spanish: Impresiona a John con tu grafiti.
description.japanese: あなたの落書きでジョンを感動させましょう。

description.english: Help Sophie and John to meet each other.
description.german: Hilf Sophie und John, sich zu treffen.
description.french: Aidez Sophie et John à se réunir.
description.italian: Aiuta Sophie e John a riunirsi.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Sophie y John a conocerse.
description.japanese: ソフィーとジョンが一緒にいるのを手伝ってください。

displayName.japanese: 私はすでにkungfuccinoを知っています

description.english: Learn how to fix the coffee machine.
description.german: Erfahren Sie, wie Sie die Kaffeemaschine reparieren.
description.french: Apprenez à réparer la machine à café.
description.italian: Imparare a riparare la macchina del caffè.
description.spanish: Aprende a arreglar la máquina de café.
description.japanese: コーヒーメーカーを修理することを学びなさい。

displayName.japanese: 食べる、祈る、カプチーノ

description.english: Make a great cappuccino for Jake.
description.german: Bereite einen großen Cappuccino für Jake vor.
description.french: Prépare un grand cappuccino pour Jake.
description.italian: Prepara un grosso cappuccino per Jake.
description.spanish: Prepara un gran capuchino para Jake.
description.japanese: ジェイクのために大きなカプチーノを用意する。

displayName.english: The Most important meal of the day
displayName.french: Le repas le plus important de la journée
displayName.italian: Il pasto più importante della giornata
displayName.spanish: La comida más importante del día
displayName.japanese: その日の最も重要な食事

description.english: Make a good breakfast for your family.
description.german: Machen Sie ein gutes Frühstück für die Familie.
description.french: Faites un bon petit déjeuner pour la famille.
description.italian: Fai una buona colazione per la famiglia.
description.spanish: Prepara un buen desayuno para la familia.
description.japanese: 家族のためにおいしい朝食を用意してください。

description.english: Toast to World Peace.
description.german: Auf den Frieden in der Welt.
description.french: À la paix dans le monde.
description.italian: Alla pace nel mondo.
description.spanish: Brinda por la paz en el mundo.
description.japanese: 世界に平和をもたらす。

description.english: Play a nice song with the guitar for Sarah.
description.german: Spiele einen schönen Gitarren-Song für Sarah.
description.french: Joue une belle chanson de guitare pour Sarah.
description.italian: Suona una bella canzone per chitarra per Sarah.
description.koreana: Sarah의 기타와 함께 멋진 노래를 연주 해보세요.
description.spanish: Toca una agradable canción con la guitarra para Sarah.
description.japanese: サラのためにギターで素敵な曲を弾きます。

description.english: Apologize to Elise.
description.german: Entschuldige dich bei Elise.
description.french: Excuse-toi auprès de Elise.
description.italian: Scusati con Elise.
description.spanish: Discúlpate con Elise.
description.japanese: サラに失礼します。

description.english: Finish the statue as your father wanted.
description.german: Beende die Statue, wie es dein Vater wollte.
description.french: Finis la statue comme ton père le voulait.
description.italian: Finisci la statua come voleva tuo padre.
description.spanish: Termina la estatua como tu padre quería.
description.japanese: あなたの父親が望んだように像を完成させなさい。

displayName.german: Um 8:02 Uhr lassen wir ihn gehen.

description.english: Learn about old man Collins.
description.german: Erfahren Sie mehr über die alten Collins.
description.french: Renseignez-vous sur le vieux Collins.
description.italian: Impara a conoscere il vecchio Collins.
description.spanish: Descubre la historia del viejo Collins.
description.japanese: 古いコリンズについて学びましょう。

description.english: Make an honest speech at the ceremony.
description.german: Mache eine ehrliche Rede während der Keramonie.
description.french: Faites un discours honnête pendant la cérémonie.
description.italian: Fai un discorso onesto durante la cerimonia.
description.spanish: Pronuncia un discurso honesto durante la ceramonia.
description.japanese: 彼は式典の間に誠実な演説をします。

description.english: Get to tomorrow.
description.german: Er kann es bis morgen schaffen.
description.french: Il peut tenir jusqu'à demain.
description.italian: Può farcela fino a domani.
description.spanish: Logra llegar hasta mañana.
description.japanese: 明日までに何とか到着します。

description.english: Complete Flashback: Time.
description.german: Vervollständigen Sie den Speicher: Zeit.
description.french: Complétez la mémoire : Le temps.
description.italian: Completa la memoria: Tempo.
description.spanish: Completa el recuerdo: Tiempo.
description.japanese: 記憶を完成させる：時間。

description.english: Complete Flashback: Tape.
description.german: Vervollständigen Sie den Speicher: Tonband.
description.french: Complétez la mémoire : Ruban adhésif.
description.italian: Completa la memoria: Nastro.
description.spanish: Completa el recuerdo: Cinta.
description.japanese: メモリを完成させる：テープ。

description.english: Complete Flashback: Community.
description.german: Vervollständigen Sie den Speicher: Community
description.french: Complétez la mémoire : Communauté
description.italian: Completa la memoria: Comunità
description.spanish: Completa el recuerdo: Comunidad.
description.japanese: 思い出を完成させるコミュニティ

displayName.japanese: フォーチュンクッキー

description.english: Complete Flashback: Paternity.
description.german: Vervollständigen Sie den Speicher: Vaterschaft.
description.french: Complétez la mémoire : Paternité.
description.italian: Completa la memoria: Paternità.
description.spanish: Completa el recuerdo: Paternidad.
description.japanese: 思い出を完成させる：父親。

description.english: Complete Flashback: Death.
description.german: Vervollständigen Sie den Speicher: Tod.
description.french: Complétez la mémoire : La mort.
description.italian: Completa la memoria: La morte.
description.spanish: Completa el recuerdo: Muerte.
description.japanese: 記憶を完成させる：死。

description.english: Hit a pigeon with a T-Shirt.
description.german: Schlage eine Taube mit einem T-Shirt.
description.french: Frapper un pigeon avec un T-shirt.
description.italian: Colpire un piccione con una maglietta.
description.spanish: Acierta a una paloma con una camiseta.
description.japanese: シャツでハトを襲います。

description.english: Break the alarm clock.
description.german: Brechen Sie den Wecker ab.
description.french: Cassez le réveil.
description.italian: Rompere la sveglia.
description.spanish: Rompe el reloj alarma.
description.japanese: 目覚まし時計を壊します。

description.english: Eat all the kale at the kitchen and punch the statue.
description.german: Iss den ganzen Spinat in der Küche und schlage die Statue.
description.french: Mangez tous les épinards dans la cuisine et frappez la statue.
description.italian: Mangiare tutti gli spinaci in cucina e prendere a pugni la statua.
description.koreana: 부엌에있는 모든 시금치를 먹고 동상을 펀치하십시오.
description.spanish: Come toda la espinaca de la cocina y dale un puñetazo a la estatua.
description.japanese: 台所ですべてのほうれん草を食べて像を打ち抜きます。

description.english: Make a Zen Smoothie for Sophie.
description.german: Bereite ein Smoothie Zen für Sophie vor.
description.french: Préparez un Smoothie Zen pour Sophie.
description.italian: Preparare un Smoothie Zen per Sophie.
description.spanish: Prepara un Smoothie Zen para Sophie.
description.japanese: Sophie用のZenスムージーを準備します。

description.english: Eat something with no hands.
description.german: Iss etwas, ohne deine Hände zu benutzen.
description.french: Mangez quelque chose sans utiliser vos mains.
description.italian: Mangiare qualcosa senza usare le mani.
description.spanish: Come algo sin usar las manos.
description.japanese: 手を使わずに何かを食べる

description.english: Try out all different doughnuts in Gobbler's Knob.
description.german: Probiere jeden Doughnut in Gobbler's Knob aus.
description.french: Essayez tous les beignets de Gobbler's Knob.
description.italian: Prova tutte le ciambelle di Gobbler's Knob.
description.spanish: Prueba todos los donuts de Gobbler's Knob.
description.japanese: Gobbler's Knobのドーナツを全部試してみてください。

description.english: Paint your face with a spray.
description.german: Sprüh dein Gesicht.
description.french: Vaporisez votre visage.
description.italian: Spruzza il viso.
description.spanish: Píntate la cara con spray.
description.japanese: 顔をスプレーで塗ります。

description.english: Ace the Ryerson Shuffle dance.
description.german: Tanze den perfekten Ryerson-Aufstand.
description.french: Dansez la révolte parfaite de Ryerson.
description.italian: Danza la perfetta Rivolta di Ryerson.
description.spanish: Baila el Revoltoso Ryerson perfecto.
description.japanese: ライアーソンシャッフルダンスのエース。

displayName.japanese: マーモットへのこだわり

description.english: Collect all groundhog cards.
description.german: Holt alle Murmeltier-Karten.
description.french: Prends toutes les cartes de marmottes.
description.italian: Prendi tutte le carte della marmotta.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las cartas de marmota.
description.japanese: すべてのマーモットカードを手に入れましょう。

description.english: Break the statue's head.
description.german: Zerstöre den Kopf der Statue.
description.french: Détruisez la tête de la statue.
description.italian: Distruggere la testa della statua.
description.spanish: Destroza la cabeza de la estatua.
description.japanese: 像の頭を破壊する

description.english: Destroy the whole statue.
description.german: Zerstöre die Statue vollständig.
description.french: Détruisez complètement la statue.
description.italian: Distruggere la statua completamente.
description.spanish: Destruye la estatua completamente.
description.japanese: その像を完全に破壊する。

description.english: Use 2 different tools at the same time at the statue.
description.german: Benutze zwei Werkzeuge gleichzeitig auf der Statue.
description.french: Utilisez deux outils en même temps sur la statue.
description.italian: Utilizzare due strumenti contemporaneamente sulla statua.
description.koreana: 조각상에 동시에 두 개의 도구를 사용하십시오.
description.spanish: Usa dos herramientas al mismo tiempo en la estatua.
description.japanese: 像の上で同時に2つの道具を使う。

description.english: Listen to the seançe.
description.german: Hören Sie sich die Radiosendung an.
description.french: Écoutez la session radio.
description.italian: Ascolta la sessione radio.
description.spanish: Escucha la sesión de radio.
description.japanese: ラジオセッションを聞きます。

description.english: Shake 4 or more ingredients in the shaker.
description.german: Mische 4 oder mehr Zutaten im Shaker.
description.french: Mélanger 4 ingrédients ou plus dans le shaker.
description.italian: Mescolare 4 o più ingredienti nello shaker.
description.spanish: Mezcla 4 o más ingredientes en la coctelera.
description.japanese: シェーカーに4つ以上の材料を混ぜる。

description.english: Shoot a T-shirt to everyone who wants it.
description.german: Schießen Sie ein T-Shirt auf jeden, der danach fragt.
description.french: Tirez sur tous ceux qui en font la demande.
description.italian: Spara una maglietta a chiunque ne faccia richiesta.
description.spanish: Dispara una camiseta a todo aquel que la pida.
description.japanese: 尋ねる人にシャツを撃ってください。

description.english: Serve tequila to Sarah at the bar in the hotel.
description.german: Serviere Sarah einen Tequila an der Hotelbar.
description.french: Servez à Sarah une tequila au bar de l'hôtel.
description.italian: Servire Sarah una tequila al bar dell'hotel.
description.spanish: Sirve un tequila a Sarah en el bar del hotel.
description.japanese: ホテルのバーでサラにテキーラをサービスします。

description.english: Shoot every balloon at the Gobbler's Knob.
description.german: Alle Gobble's Knob-Ballons explodieren.
description.french: Tous les ballons de Gobble's Knob explosent.
description.italian: Tutti i palloncini Gobble's Knob esplodono.
description.spanish: Estalla todos los globos de Gobble's Knob.
description.japanese: Gobble's Knobの風船がすべて爆発します。

description.english: Finish the snowman.
description.german: Beende den Schneemann.
description.french: Finis le bonhomme de neige.
description.italian: Finisci il pupazzo di neve.
description.spanish: Termina el muñeco de nieve.
description.japanese: 雪だるまは終わります。

displayName.japanese: ピッツバーグで最高のウェイター

description.english: Juggle with the bottles on the bar.
description.german: Jonglieren Sie mit den Flaschen der Bar.
description.french: Jonglez avec les bouteilles du bar.
description.italian: Mescolare le bottiglie del bar.
description.spanish: Haz malabarismos con las botellas del bar.
description.japanese: バーの瓶をジャグリングします。

description.english: Start a day with good cheer.
description.german: Beginnen Sie den Tag gut gelaunt.
description.french: Commencez la journée dans la bonne humeur.
description.italian: Comincia la giornata di buon umore.
description.spanish: Empieza el día de buen ánimo.
description.japanese: 元気の日が始まります。

description.english: Score 30 free throws in the basket one morning.
description.german: Es passt zu 30 Körben an einem Morgen.
description.french: Assorti à 30 paniers en une matinée.
description.italian: Abbina 30 cestini in una mattina.
description.koreana: 어느 날 아침 30 개의 바구니를 성공시킵니다.
description.spanish: Acierta 30 canastas en una mañana.
description.japanese: ある朝30個のバスケットを成功させる

description.english: Get totally wasted.
description.german: Betrink dich und verlier das Bewusstsein.
description.french: Se soûler et perdre connaissance.
description.italian: Ubriacatevi e perdete conoscenza.
description.spanish: Emborráchate y pierde el conocimiento.
description.japanese: 酔って意識を失います。
